tracks.text: A grenade flies through the kitchen window.
Everyone runs
The house explodes
At the house
Jimmy talks to 3 smiling dolls on the table.
He picks up a doll, strangles it, punches it, and rips off a leg.
At Wayne Gretzky High School, a girl with orange hair, bushy eyebrows, and bad posture undoes a wedgie in her pants and smiles.
She spins a pencil in her ear
The girl walks away
At the house, Gina dumps candy on the kitchen table.
Jimmy bites a chocolate bar and pauses.
The dolls
Cookie is fat and covered in chocolate
Jimmy drives up to the U.S. Customs and Border Patrol.
He hands a passport with a chocolate bar in it. The agent pockets the bar.
Other border guards overhear.

Jimmy and Cheech smile. The family drives by a crumbling billboard with an American flag reading Welcome to America, The Greatest Country on Earth. It's covered in brown stains. The next billboard reads ALL Guns Allowed. Nearby, a mangey Bald Eagle eats fast food on a road construction sign.
Billboard: Bank of USA, We'll take your money and charge you for it.
The kids grab at the Wonka-esque man's pants. His eyes roll back.
Jimmy and Cheech beat the candy man with bats. Oompa Loompas watch as blood splatters on their faces and clothes.
The Oompas shake their heads.
Kids and adults line up down the street, cash in hand.
Oompas exchange cash for candy bars in boxes.
Kids holding cash surround Cookie, who shows a red and yellow chocolate bar
Dakota County Elementary School.
The oompas hand their fur coast to Jimmy and run away
A small blond child shows 4 quarters.
Cookie sees the arrest, turns to see a cop on a motorcycle, jump kicks him to the ground, then drives the motorcycle away.
She smiles as she jiggles
Dakota County Sheriff's Office.
The 27th Annual Blue Rodeo Rodeo
A cowboy rides an angry bull. Another rides a horse past barrels. Another rides a horse and lassos a calf. 2 horses pull a carriage. The bull rider falls off.
Gina hands the phone to Cookie, then tries to light a lighter.
At the house, Theresa sits on her bed.
Purple suit
At Wayne and Shoe Store
An old woman
At the rodeo
Jimmy wears assless chaps
McCool rides a bucking horse.
Jimmy's horse moves forward one step and he falls off.
McCool chases a calf
He lassos it. They fall in a cartoon cloud of dust and limbs. They stop, and the cow is tied by its legs.
Jimmy chases a calf, swings a lasso, and catches a bird.
Jimmy flies by the lasso rope, hits the side of the ring, then gets dragged through the dirt.
The calf sits nearby, smoking a cigarette.
McCool drives a carriage.
He drops the reigns, stands on his head, juggles upside down, stands up, blows fire, then starts playing an instrument. A python rises up.
Jimmy cracks the whip, and it flies back at his face.
His whip catches the bird, and he gets pulled out of the driver seat.
He crashes through several wooden barriers and smacks into the side of the ring.
McCool rides the bucking bull, hands in the air.
He does a backflip off the bull and poses while the crowd cheers.
He pulls out a bruised butt.
Jimmy walks down the road at sunset, past horses, farmland, and suburbia.
At the house
Smacking leg or with a lasso
At a small purple house surrounded by bushes and trees
She pulls his head into her large, sagging bosom.
He flails
A bruised butt
He stands, his butt in the front, looking like giant balls
At the small purple house at dawn. Petey wakes up in bed with the old woman, both naked
In the shower, he shivers in the fetal position
A cowboy boot steps forward in a dirt field. Jimmy, wearing a cowboy hat, stares forward. His fingers twitch at his side.
Gina stares, then smiles.
Theresa blinks. Cheech and Cookie blink.
The family stands behind Jimmy at the rodeo.
The family watches from the stands. Petey walks up in torn clothes, shivering.
The orange haired girl runs after him. Jimmy gets on a bull.
The bull bucks him across the stadium.
Jimmy gets tossed into a barrel.
Jimmy climbs on the bull, gets tossed in the air, and lands on the ground.
Jimmy gets tossed into a wooden barrier.
He gets tossed in the air, through storm clouds, and gets struck by lightning
Jimmy flies into the crowd, against a wall, and into a barrier. He hits another wall, splattering blood.
The bull says, Stay down foolish human. You have been bested.
